_json.title: Winning Your Wife Back Before It's Too Late: Whether She's Left Physically or Emotionally All That Matters Is... - Softcover
_json.gridTitle: Winning Your Wife Back Before It's Too Late: Whether She's Left Physically or Emotionally All That Matters Is... - Softcover
_json.description: Winning your wife back from emotional or physical separation is more than doing the same things with more intensity. It involves developing a whole new strategy to overcome what seem to be overwhelming odds to attain a come-from-behind victory. In Winning Your Wife Back Before It's Too late, Gary Smalley utilizes the following game plan to significantly increase your chances for a "miracle comeback": Understand "penalty flags" Open a closed spirit Honor your wife and children Develop sacrificial
